QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Dustwallow Marsh!
QuestData.Description: All able bodied members of the Horde are hereby ordered to report to Krog at Brackenwall Village. The marsh is overrun with enemies of many kinds and the Alliance forces there are dangerously strong.$B$BYou can travel to Dustwallow Marsh by following the path from the eastern part of the Southern Barrens toward Brackenwall Village. Or, you can get a flight there from Doras in Orgrimmar.$B$BDestiny calls!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Krog at Brackenwall Village in Dustwallow Marsh. Optionally, grab a flight there from Doras in Orgrimmar.
QuestData.RewardText: If we can get things straightened out here, we have a chance to strike at the Alliance while most of their forces are busy in the Barrens.

Objectives.Objective: Speak with Krog in Brackenwall Village
